CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Similarly , the measured field - effect mobility of PFD2TBT , PFD2TBT-5Per , and PFD2TBT-10Per was 2.7 × 10^-6 , 1.1 × 10^-5 , and 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / ( V s ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PFD2TBT      |
| PFD2TBT-5Per |
| PFD2TBT-10Per |

These entities are clearly referred to as materials in the paragraph, as they are the specific types of PFD2TBT mentioned in the context of the measured field-effect mobility.

Paragraph: Similarly , the measured field - effect mobility of PFD2TBT , PFD2TBT-5Per , and PFD2TBT-10Per was 2.7 × 10^-6 , 1.1 × 10^-5 , and 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / ( V s ) , respectively.

| Value for PFD2TBT-10Per: 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / (V s) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| Measured field-effect mobility of PFD2TBT |
| Measured field-effect mobility of PFD2TBT-5Per |
| Measured field-effect mobility of PFD2TBT-10Per |

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties. The other entities, such as "cm^2 / (V s)" and "respectively," do not provide enough context to be considered as properties.
